synopsis.text:
Anime Synopsis:

In the bustling city of Southtown, the Bogard brothers, Terry and Andy, embark on a quest for vengeance a decade after their foster father's untimely death at the hands of the ruthless crime lord, Geese Howard. Under the tutelage of their mentor Tung Fe Rue, the duo has honed their martial arts skills to perfection. To finally confront their nemesis, they join forces with the formidable kickboxing champion, Joe Higashi, and enter the prestigious King of Fighters tournament. As they battle their way through the competition, they edge closer to the ultimate showdown with Geese, aiming to deliver his long-overdue defeat. Based on the popular video game, Fatal Fury, this anime promises intense action and thrilling encounters.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
